ygData.subject: re some stuff :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, the lvl 15 pet does not have magical attacks. it can bash however. if you shadow step, your pet will not commit suicide, it ll just either run to you, stay
ygData.messageBody:
ok, the lvl 15 pet does not have magical attacks. it can bash however.
if you shadow step, your pet will not commit suicide, it'll just either run
to you, stay there, or keep fighting, depending on what you'd been having it do.
pets are NOT allowed in duels. however, they may be allowed in guild wars..
they would make for some interesting strategies too :) to be absolutely sure
you'd have to ask someone on rallos, which is set up more or less like
permanent guild war for everybody :)

the dark elf npcs in the commonlands (dragoon zytl and kizdean gix) are not
KoS to human shadowknights. but they dont like us THAT much, so try to keep
your faction standings with the dark elves up.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
